document.full_text: mississippi is set to execute later on tuesday a man convicted in 1999 of slaying four people, the first inmate in the state to be put to death using a new drug as part of the lethal injection.
document.title: mississippi set to execute man for murder of four people
lines_and_colors: mississippi is set to execute later on tuesday a man convicted in 1999 of slaying four people, the first inmate in the state to be put to death using a new drug as part of the lethal injection.
